titleStmt.title: An act for banishing all papists exercising any ecclesiastical jurisdiction, and all regulars of the popish clergy out of this kingdom.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, printer to the King's Most Excellent Majesty, on Cork-Hill, near Copper Alley.
